data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
XML::OCS works nearly identically to XML::RSS except it processes
    OCS (Open Content Syndication) feeds instead of RSS feeds.

    There used to be a project for a perl module to process OCS feeds
    (also called XML::OCS) on Freshmeat but it was removed long ago and
    appears to have disappeared completely. The module was also at one
    time stored and documented at: http://internetalchemy.org/ocs/perl/,
    but now it is gone as well. I am not aware of any existing ways to
    parse OCS feeds with perl, although sites such as moreover.com,
    syndic8.com and 10.am still provide (some free, I believe) OCS
    feeds.

    http://internetalchemy.org/ocs/ for more information on the OCS
    standard.
